channel.title: Select option?

item.title: Select option?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Alright well im using this for a screen with 5 options to select from.

public void selectoption5(String question, String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4, String s5) { sendFrame126(question, 8220); sendFrame126(s1, 8221); sendFrame126(s2, 8222); sendFrame126(s3, 8223); sendFrame126(s4, 8224); sendFrame126(s5, 8225); sendFrame164(8219); }

Which works fine.
For something actually to pop up when you select them there is thisâ€¦

case 32029: break; case 32030: break; case 32031: break; case 32032: break; case 32033: break;

And when i put like wanneshop under it or something the shops open. But say i want something else to have selectoption 5. Say another set of shops? Well i can write that text, but it still opens the first ones because that is what the case says to do. So how can i make it so it can open either or?

Read full topic
